plot: Akane Mizuno and Kotarō Azumi are two third-year middle school students who become classmates for the first time. Akane is a member of the school track team and Kotarō is the literary club president who loves books and wants to become a writer. The two seem an unlikely romantic pair, and the people and situations around them make that possibility even more difficult.
ending_theme: "Tsuki ga Kirei" (月がきれい) by Nao Tōyama
insert_song: "Hatsukoi" (初恋; First Love) by Nao Tōyama (ep 3)
"Mirai e" (未来へ; Into the Future) by Nao Tōyama (ep 11)
"Natsu Matsuri" (夏祭り; Summer Festival) by Nao Tōyama (ep 8)
"Sangatsu Kokonoka" (３月９日; Ninth of March) by by Nao Tōyama (ep 6)
"Tabidachi no Hi ni" (旅立ちの日に; On the Day We Depart) by Kawagoe City 3rd Middle School Year 3 Class 1 (ep 7)
"Yasashii Kimochi" (やさしい気持ち; Kind Feelings) by Nao Tōyama (ep 5)
